title: v0.12.0-beta Release Highlights

highlights.title: Major UI/UX redesign with dynamic themes and modern layouts
highlights.description: A ground-up refresh of the interface focused on clarity, speed, and accessibility. The layout adapts fluidly across breakpoints, typography is standardized for readability, and progressive disclosure keeps complex forms approachable. Dynamic themes allow the workspace to match your mood or environment without sacrificing contrast ratios.
details: Responsive shell with sidebar navigation and card-based content areas
Unified background system that harmonizes with light/dark themes
Improved focus states, spacing rhythm, and semantic headings for A11y

highlights.title: Introduced new dynamic backgrounds
highlights.description: Ten creative, performance-friendly backgrounds give each workspace a distinct personality. Backgrounds are opt-in, theme-aware, and can be toggled per-user. They work seamlessly with the redesigned shell and avoid visual noise that could impact focus.
details: 10 curated themes with subtle motion (reduced motion honored)
Accessible color palettes with WCAG AA contrast targets
Instant preview with safe fallbacks for low-power devices

highlights.title: Improved toast notification system
highlights.description: Notifications are now more informative and less intrusive. The system supports types (info/success/warning/error), auto-dismiss with sensible defaults, and manual dismissal for persistent messages. Messages are keyboard-navigable and screen-reader friendly.
details: Consistent placement with stack management and safe area awareness
ARIA roles, labels, and focus management for assistive tech
Hooks and utilities for easy integration across forms and flows

added: Dynamic backgrounds (10 creative themes), sidebar navigation, and modern card-based layouts
Multiple form design systems (Creative, Productivity Focused, Modern, etc.)
Toast notification system and improved notification center with persistent scheduling (UTC support)
Advanced form components: floating labels, animated inputs, priority selectors, expandable sections
Modular component library for consistent UI development
Automated accessibility tests (axe-core) and ARIA improvements
Persistent notification scheduling and new API endpoints for task dependencies
End-of-version checklist template and personal change tracking system
changed: Major UI/UX redesign: responsive layout, unified backgrounds, enhanced typography, progressive disclosure for forms
Authentication and security: robust CSRF handling, session management, secure logout, authentication guards

All major flows, accessibility, and coverage requirements tracked in checklists and roadmap
Documentation updated for all new features, test patterns, migration notes, and best practices

Persistent notification scheduling and new endpoints for task dependencies
